message:
Dear Sir,

This is a final reminder that your license **{{ doc.license_name }}** (License No: {{ doc.license_number }}) will expire in **2 hours** (on {{ doc.expiry_date }}).

Please renew it immediately to avoid any interruptions.

Thank you,  
IT Team
name: License Renewal Reminder in 2 Hours
subject: {{doc.license_number}} Renewal Reminder in 2 Hours
